result.purpose: Responsible for managing device data through repository interfaces and models.
result.architecture: The folder follows a repository pattern, encapsulating data access logic and providing an interface for device management.

internal/domains/devicemanager/repos/dev.purpose: Defines a repository interface and implementation for managing device data in a database.

internal/domains/devicemanager/repos/mod.purpose: Defines the device model and conversion functions for the device manager.
